content: Dotster $1.00 Domain Registration Happy Hour Moz News By: Rand Fishkin February 12, 2006 The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Table of Contents Copied! By: Rand Fishkin February 12, 2006 Dotster $1.00 Domain Registration Happy Hour Moz News The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. My friend Scott Fish dropped me a line on this neat little opportunity to pick up domain names at a very nice price: On Tuesday, the 14th between 4pm est until 5pm est Dotster.com is giving away $1 domains (limit 1 per order, but you can make unlimited orders). Any COM/NET/ORG domain can be registered. Shows above - a countdown timer on the homepage of the Dotster site giving you the heads up for how long to wait. I'm planning on picking up a few myself. Copied! Back to Top
